attributes.jobDescription: I'm focused on front-end web development. My team work on a specific campaign from some FMCG brands. We also work on a back office tool to manage campaigns. At the end of my journey in this company, I contribute to initiate and develop new design system.
achievements: Improve page performance of a certain campaign page

attributes.jobDescription: I get my first backend task in this company. However, I'm still focus on front-end web development. Here, I gain trust from my leaders to be a maintainer of some repositories related to web including [Pinhome's consumer web](https://www.pinhome.id/). I contribute to develop Pinhome's web [multi zones](https://nextjs.org/docs/advanced-features/multi-zones) at initial stage. In this company, I also maintain and develop our design system for web. Many lessons learned from my engineering fellows here. Thanks guys
